subject: Baseball
United States International Relations
Embargoes and Sanctions
United States Politics and Government
lead_paragraph: The vision of an active relationship between Cuba and Major League Baseball became a little more real after President Obama’s announcement that he planned to restore full diplomatic relations with the island nation.
